Title: Turquoise Rose
Writer: Cara Rose Brown (additional material), Marjorie Coltrin Detiege (contributing writer), Travis Holt Hamilton, Jake Johnson (contributing writer)
Actors: Deshava Apachee, Donavon G. Barney, Ethel Begay, Kathleen Benner
Plot: "Turquoise Rose" is a coming of age story about a Navajo girl from Arizona. Raised in the suburbs of Phoenix, "T" attends college and is interning as a photojournalist at the local paper. ...
